message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.NI. 

The paper proposes a novel construction of polar codes and a decoding algorithm, which are both related to information theory (cs.IT). The codes are subcodes of extended BCH codes, which are commonly used in error-correcting codes (cs.CC). The proposed decoding algorithm involves directed search in a code tree, which is a common technique in search algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of estimates of channel error probabilities, which is related to signal processing (cs.SI) and networking (cs.NI).
